pages.text: Border Collies are nimble dogs originally bred for herding sheep and other animals.$(br2)Standing just under a block tall, these nimble dogs come in six coats.
Example of a Black Border Collie
Border Collies can be found most commonly in open fields, such as plains and meadows. You can also find them in birch forests, and more rarely in the taiga.
pages.title: Location
Taming
pages.text: These dogs can be tamed with a Mutton Treat.
